name: SOA Training
overview:
Why Us ======= We specialize in providing quality training to our students at a low cost. This web based training is provided by the founder who is an SOA Architect, SOA Certified and has 7 years of experience as Architect and Technical Lead

How do we go about it ===================== â€¢ Training is structured as 16 sessions of 1.5 hours each, so that you get introduced to one concept at a time and get enough time to practice that one concept. â€¢ Sessions would be held on alternate days. â€¢ The batches are scheduled at 7:30 AM IST to 9:00 AM IST â€¢ If one misses any lecture, there is a provision to get the recording of that session, subject to a maximum of 2 recordings overall. â€¢ The training is provided over the web using webconferencing software, so you just need a computer to attend it. Both video and sound shall come through the computer â€¢ The trainer can take control of your machine and assist you in resolving any issues â€¢ Detailed notes is provided on each topic and step by step instructions will be provided to execute the exercises â€¢ Each topic will be explained using live demo of the concept, starting from scratch â€¢ Support for 2 months from the end date of the training
